pages.title: UPDATE 1: Refine it
pages.text: 8/00/2025$(br)$(br)The next few updates will be focusing on creating a framework for the mod. This update brings a few new items and 2 new machines, plus brand new features to enjoy. Below is the full update log.

pages.title: Items Added
pages.text: • Silicon Dust$(br)• Silicon Ingot$(br)• Crude Oil$(br)• Propane Gas$(br)• Propane Tanks$(br)• Gasoline$(br)• Diesel$(br)• Asphalt

pages.title: Gameplay Features
pages.text: • Propane Tanks can be filled inside the Filler machine with Propane Gas.$(br)• The Refinery can currently be used to refine Crude Oil into usable products.$(br)• General quality of life improvements.$(br)• Multiple bug fixes.

pages.title: Final Notes
pages.text: The update is playable now and may require the latest NeoForge version.$(br)$(br)More updates coming soon!$(br)$(br)Have an amazing rest of summer and God bless.
